item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m Tho, a Software Engineer specializing in C++ and Python development for high-performance financial systems. Currently at Société Générale, I focus on building and optimizing market-making tools and order management platforms. With expertise in real-time trading systems, I ensure low-latency, reliable, and compliant solutions for dynamic financial environments.
